abstract: Richard C. Notebaert, who is credited with bringing Qwest Communications back from an accounting scandal and the brink of bankruptcy, surprised investors Monday by announcing that he planned to resign as chief executive and chairman.
lead_paragraph: Richard C. Notebaert, who is credited with bringing Qwest Communications back from an accounting scandal and the brink of bankruptcy, surprised investors Monday by announcing that he planned to resign as chief executive and chairman.

headline.main: As Qwest Chief Retires, Is a Buyout on the Horizon?
